data.name: Battle Chef Brigade - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Original Soundtrack by the amazing Tom Dunkin, featuring an original piece by Fat Bard! Slice and dice your way to a delicious meal with the sounds of Battle Chef Brigade! Includes high quality MP3 and FLAC versions, along with a piano arrangement of the Title Theme!

NOTE: When purchase and installed the soundtrack should appear in your Battle Chef Brigade game folder. TO locate, right click on Battle Chef Brigade in your Steam Library and select Properties. Then, click the Local Files tab and click on Browse Local Files. You should find the BCB Soundtrack in that directory.

Track List:
1. Trailer (Extended Cut)
2. Title Theme
3. Windy Village
4. The Field
5. Brigade Town (Main)
6. Task Complete
7. Goodnight, Chef
8. Battle Intro
9. The Chef's Resolve (Forest Arena)
10. The Chef's Ascent (Skyland Arena)
11. The Chef's Fortitude (Caverns Arena)
12. Judging
13. Victory!
14. The Dispute
15. Dejection
16. Simon
17. Boss Battle
18. Induction
19. Close Your Eyes (Ending Credits)
20. The Chef's Journey (Townspeople's Mix)
21. Title (Demo)
22. Brigade Town (Regal Warren Inn)
23. Brigade Town (Hunter's Guild)
24. Brigade Town (Belchior's Workshop)
25. Brigade Town (Crescent Restaurant)
26. Cherry Blossom Respite (Demo)
27. Windy Village (Alternate Version)
28. Caverns (Alternate Version)
29. Celebrate! (Alternate Victory)
30. The Chef's Sampler (Salad Lover's Mix)

*languages with full audio support
